amendment.description: To prohibit liability immunity to applying to private entities that break user or privacy agreements with customers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2564 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 282.

action.text: Amendment SA 2564 proposed by Senator Burr for Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2716. (consideration: CR S7335; text as modified: CR S7335) To prohibit liability immunity to applying to private entities that break user or privacy agreements with customers.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2564 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 65. Record Vote Number: 282.
